snippet.title: Axle Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
In a small toy shop, a kindly toy maker brought life to a small gear named Axle. While newly made, he faces the world with a bright outlook and an eagerness to use his mechanical skill to fix broken devices. However, his adventure is only just beginning, and he’ll need your help before everything becomes beyond repair…

Instead of going right, left, up, or down to control Axle, you move clockwise and counterclockwise in this revolutionary game. 


Now on the Google Play Store:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.FallstreakStudio.Axle&hl=en

Now on iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/axle/id924780120?mt=8

If you love Steampunk, Electroswing, and indie games, Axle is the game for you!

Like and Follow us on: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AxleTheGame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/AxleTheGame
Tumblr: http://axle-the-game.tumblr.com/
